title: Samsung rolls out Galaxy Buds Proâ€™s 360 Audio feature to the Galaxy Buds Live
content:
Samsung introduced a new feature called 360 Audio with its flagship TWS earbuds — the Galaxy Buds Pro. Earlier this month, the company rolled it out to the Galaxy Buds 2 with a software update, giving users a chance to experience 360-degree audio on the affordable earbuds. Now, Samsung is rolling out a similar update

The post Samsung rolls out Galaxy Buds Pro’s 360 Audio feature to the Galaxy Buds Live appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has started rolling out Galaxy Buds Pro's 360 Audio feature to the Galaxy Buds Live. Read on to learn more.
